name: google-sheets-cli
description: CLI tool for programmatic Google Sheets access with secure credential management and git history analysis
author: Ebowwa Labs <labs@ebowwa.com>

scripts.build: bun build ./src/cli/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --banner '/*#!/usr/bin/env node*/' && bun build ./src/cli/git-analyzer.ts --outdir ./dist --target node
